pages.title: FlexPay Revenue and Customer Recovery Calculator
pages.summary: This page provides a revenue and customer recovery calculator to estimate the potential benefits of using FlexPay's Invisible Recovery solution. It allows users to input their current business metrics and compare revenue and customer growth forecasts with and without FlexPay. The calculator highlights the potential for increased revenue, customer retention, and overall growth by recovering failed payments.
key_points: Calculate potential revenue and customer growth with FlexPay Invisible Recovery.
Compare revenue forecasts with and without FlexPay.
Recover up to 70% of failed payments.
Faster recovery means revenue recovered in just 2.6 days vs other recovery methods that take 30 days
AI-powered solution creates individual recovery strategies for each failed payment

pages.title: FlexPay Blog
